directions: In a small bowl whisk together the zest, the juices, the mustard, and the salt, add the oil in a stream, whisking, and whisk the dressing until it is emulsified. In a large bowl toss the spinach and the mushrooms with the dressing.
ingredients: 2 pounds fresh spinach, coarse stems discarded and the leaves washed  well, spun dry, and, if desired, torn into bite-size pieces
title: Spinach and Mushrooms Salad with Orange Vinaigrette
